verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa kahe,--tomā-sabā dekhite citta haila
tāhā lāgi' eka ṭhāñi sabā bolāila

synonyms: kṛṣṇa kahe—Lord Kṛṣṇa said; tomā-sabā—all of you; dekhite—to see; citta haila—there was a desire; tāhā lāgi'-for that reason; eka ṭhāñi—in one place; sabā—all of you; bolāila—I called for.
translation: "Lord Kṛṣṇa replied, 'Since I wanted to see all of you together, I have called all of you here.
